What’s New

Version 1.0.0 — Welcome to Chatura

Chatura: Where Cura Meets Chat.

Welcome to Chatura — a companion app featuring AI-generated characters designed for warm, everyday conversation.

Whether you want to celebrate a small win, untangle a thought, or simply feel a little steadier, you can open the app and start talking—no setup, no forms.

What’s inside in 1.0.0

  • A warm core companion, ready anytime: text-first chat for gentle check-ins and everyday grounding.
  • A cast of characters (6 total): explore different tones and perspectives (subscription unlocks 5 more).
  • Moments: characters share small slices of daily life and thoughts—like, comment, or jump straight into chat.
  • Keepsakes you can revisit (created through conversation):
    • Our Memory: highlights from your chats, automatically captured (and you can also ask to create one).
    • Our Plan: talk it through and turn it into a simple written plan.
    • Time Capsule: leave something for your future self.
    • Wish Voice: name a wish so it feels real and return to it later.
    • Secret Haven: a dedicated space for what’s hardest to say.
  • Secret Haven protection: optional iOS App Lock + locally encrypted storage (for Secret Haven).
  • Privacy and control: no ads. You can delete conversations anytime and export your chat data whenever you want.

A few good first messages

Try one of these:

  • “I’m feeling a bit off—can you help me name what’s going on?”
  • “Let’s make a simple plan for my week.”
  • “Help me draft a calm message I’m nervous to send.”
  • “I want to write a Time Capsule for a future date.”
  • “I have something private—can we put it in Secret Haven?”

Thank you for trusting Chatura on day one. We’ll keep making it warmer and more reliable with every update.
